name: EMPIRE EARTH 2
description:
This is the installer for the GOG Version + the unofficial 1.5 patch from ee2.eu (needed for multiplayer and more in-game functionality).
This script downloads the newest patch version automatically.
notes: You need to install Wine dependencies first, like for the blizzard app: https://github.com/lutris/lutris/wiki/Game:-Blizzard-App#dependencies-for-blizzard-app You also need to install MS fonts like explained here: https://github.com/lutris/lutris/wiki/Game:-Blizzard-App#system-dependencies-for-fixing-font-rendering-errors Select YES when you get the Unsupported Operating System message during installation of the patch. When you start the game the first time you get a message telling you to not use the compatibility mode, just click yes. If you have missing textures try to disable DX9 in the UP1.5 Settings. Sometimes the keys aren't working in the game. Just tab out and tab back in.

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Empire Earth II Gold Edition/EE2.exe

task.description:
Installing the game. You may see an error message at the end, you can ignore that.
------------------------------
Let Lutris installer finish first. Launch the game afterwards.
task.name: wineexec

task.description:
Installing the patch. Select YES when you get the Unsupported Operating System message.
------------------------------
Let Lutris installer finish first. Launch UP1.5 Settings and the Launcher later (uncheck the launch now options before you click on finish)!
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the Gog Installer setup_empire_earthxxx.exe.
- patch:
    filename: ee2patch.exe
    url: https://patch.ee2.eu/patch15/download/ee2eu-direct.php?linux=true
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Empire Earth II Gold Edition/EE2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: 'Installing the game. You may see an error message at the end, you
      can ignore that.

      ------------------------------

      Let Lutris installer finish first. Launch the game afterwards.'
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: 'Installing the patch. Select YES when you get the Unsupported Operating
      System message.

      ------------------------------

      Let Lutris installer finish first. Launch UP1.5 Settings and the Launcher later
      (uncheck the launch now options before you click on finish)!'
    executable: patch
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9_43
    description: Installing d3dx9_43
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43
    description: Installing d3dcompiler_43
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    description: Installing corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: msftedit
    description: Installing msftedit
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: riched30
    description: Installing riched30
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  version: staging-3.16-x86_64
